titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 3-(Ethylsulfonly)-2-pyridinesulfonamide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 6/8/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the suspension, through December 31, 2009, of the duty on 3-(Ethylsulfonly)-2-pyridinesulfonamide.
